The provided chunk serves as the module header for the `Audio3DManager` class implementation. It includes the necessary imports from Panda3D and Direct, defines which classes are exported, and sets up the environment where the 3D audio management system operates.

"""Contains the Audio3DManager class."""

__all__ = ['Audio3DManager']

from panda3d.core import Vec3, VBase3, WeakNodePath, ClockObject
from direct.task.TaskManagerGlobal import Task, taskMgr
